types:type.name: json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type json = {| customerId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, customerName: String, items: Array<{| itemDescription: String, itemNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"}, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, quantity: Number {"typeId": "int"}, "type": String |}>, salesOrderNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\"customerId\":1,\"customerName\":\"Adan Rosales\",\"items\":[{\"itemDescription\":\"it\u00B4s a doll\",\"itemNumber\":15215,\"price\":12,\"quantity\":3,\"type\":\"item\"},{\"itemDescription\":\"Internet\",\"itemNumber\":221,\"price\":133,\"quantity\":2,\"type\":\"service\"}],\"salesOrderNumber\":1000}"}

types:type.name: base
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type base = {| items: Array<{| idcostumers: Number {"typeId": "int"}, iditems: Number {"typeId": "int"} |}> |} {"example": "{\"items\":[{\"idcostumers\":7,\"iditems\":11}]}"}

types:type.name: csv
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type csv = {| customerName: String, iditems: Number {"typeId": "int"}, itemDescription: String, salesOrderNumber: String |} {"example": "{\"customerName\":\"Lyndis\",\"iditems\":40,\"itemDescription\":\"water\",\"salesOrderNumber\":\"21331\"}"}
